rules: Rule1: the expedition leader issues a retreat order, or if it is not the case that the expedition team encountering a hidden underground chamber results in either the primary excavation site being secured or the expedition team successfully locating the Sunstone Amulet, then the artifact protection plan for the ancient artifact is activated.
Rule2: Provided that the remote jungle camp is established, then it is not the case that the expedition leader issues a retreat order.

Rule3: Should vital medical supplies, including an antidote, be delivered to the remote camp, then either the primary excavation site is secured or the expedition team successfully locates the Sunstone Amulet.
Rule4: Either vital medical supplies, including an antidote, are delivered to the remote camp, or the ancient inscription found at the preliminary site is decoded by the archaeologist team.

Rule5: If the ancient inscription found at the preliminary site is decoded by the archaeologist team, then either the primary excavation site is secured or the expedition team successfully locates the Sunstone Amulet.
Rule6: The authentication of the ancient map results in the expedition team successfully locating the Sunstone Amulet.
Rule7: Either the local guide is available, or the expedition team successfully locates the Sunstone Amulet.
Rule8: When the expedition team uses advanced ground-penetrating radar, it follows that the local guide is not available.

Rule9: If it is not the case that the expedition team encountering a hidden underground chamber results in either the primary excavation site being secured or the expedition team successfully locating the Sunstone Amulet, then it is not the case that the artifact protection plan for the ancient artifact is activated.
Rule10: Should the ancient map not be authenticated, then the expedition jeep is operational.
facts: Fact1: The remote jungle camp is established.
Fact2: The expedition team uses advanced ground-penetrating radar.
Fact3: The expedition team encounters a hidden underground chamber.
Fact4: It is not the case that the primary excavation site is secured.
Fact5: The expedition jeep is not operational.

question: The expedition team successfully locates the Sunstone Amulet.
